programme.desc: A Shaolin monk attempts to change the habits of a brash young troublemaker, Sai-Yuk. Though Sai-Yuk manages to leave the temple at night, he falls into the trap of a malicious governor.

programme.title: Apocalypto
programme.desc: Jaguar Paw, a young man, is captured by rulers of the Mayan kingdom. When they decide to sacrifice him, he makes a plan to escape death.

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: Hoping to spend Christmas with his estranged wife, detective John McClane arrives in LA. However, he learns about a hostage situation in an office building and his wife is one of the hostages.

programme.title: A Cure For Wellness
programme.desc: Lockhart travels to a mysterious wellness spa in the Swiss Alps to retrieve his company's CEO. However, he encounters strange things that make him question the spa's seemingly miraculous treatments.

programme.title: Land Of The Bears
programme.desc: The filmmaker observes the mannerisms, daily activities and adventures of five wild brown bears in the Kamchatka Peninsula.

programme.title: Love Is In The Air
programme.desc: Antoine, a lawyer from New York, travels to France for the final round of a job interview. On the flight, he is seated next to Julie, his ex-girlfriend, with whom he has to make awkward conversation.

programme.title: Rob Reiner - When Harry Met Sally
programme.desc: Director Rob Reiner talks about his 1989 movie 'When Harry Met Sally...', shares his on-set experiences and reveals interesting information about the film.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of a demonic serial killer, Edgar Reese. However, the killings resume and are very similar to the style of Reese.

programme.title: Wild For The Night
programme.desc: When an ex-convict returns home to solve his sister's murder, the authority forces him to go undercover to help them bust illegal activities at a nightclub.

programme.title: Mune
programme.desc: When a group of evildoers steal the sun, the guardians of the moon and the sun set out on a journey to fight against the group and retrieve the sun.

programme.title: Disciples Of The 36th Chamber
programme.desc: A Shaolin monk attempts to change the habits of a brash young troublemaker, Sai-Yuk. Though Sai-Yuk manages to leave the temple at night, he falls into the trap of a malicious governor.

programme.title: Men In Black II
programme.desc: Agent J is after a shapeshifting alien seeking a powerful but little-known object. To save the world, he must reunite with his former partner, Agent K.

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: Hoping to spend Christmas with his estranged wife, detective John McClane arrives in LA. However, he learns about a hostage situation in an office building and his wife is one of the hostages.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: When Shredder and his evil Foot Clan wreak havoc in New York, four genetically mutated turtles rise from the sewers to free the city from his control.

programme.title: A Cure For Wellness
programme.desc: Lockhart travels to a mysterious wellness spa in the Swiss Alps to retrieve his company's CEO. However, he encounters strange things that make him question the spa's seemingly miraculous treatments.

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Venetian merchant and adventurer Marco Polo journeys across Europe and Asia and lands up as a prisoner in the palace of Kublai Khan, a 13th century Mongolian emperor. USA 2014.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: A film crew shooting a big-budget war movie are forced to become the soldiers they are portraying, when they are attacked by a gang of poppy-growing local drug dealer, due to mistaken identities.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: A giant, mutated lizard goes on a rampage across New York City after attacking a freighter in the Pacific. The disastrous event brings together a team of unlikely heroes who must save the day.

programme.title: Hostel
programme.desc: Three travellers meet a man who convinces them to visit a hostel in Slovakia with beautiful women. However, when they reach their destination, they encounter terrifying situations.

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: A former soldier along with his teammates sets out on a mission to battle hordes of post-apocalyptic zombies in the Korean peninsula wastelands.

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Snipped In The Bud
programme.desc: Abby happens to meet her old rival while delivering a bouquet of roses ordered by an anonymous person. However, things get worse when the man is later found dead and all evidence points to Abby.

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Mum's the Word
programme.desc: Abby's vintage car gets damaged when it is hit by a reckless driver. She teams up with Marco, a former private investigator, to find the culprit.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: Qin, an accountant living in the UK, is targeted by the leader of a terrorist organisation. His only hope for survival is Vanguard, an elite security company.

programme.title: Fight To the Finish
programme.desc: Sean, an amateur fighter, interferes in the personal life of a hardened criminal. When the criminal threatens his life, Sean decides to settle the matter in a fighting tournament.

programme.title: Eat Pray Love
programme.desc: Elizabeth Gilbert's perfect world comes shattering down when she gets divorced. She then embarks on a journey across the world in an attempt to rediscover her true self.

programme.title: Impulse
programme.desc: Upon unknowningly spending a sensual night with her husband's lookalike, a married woman finds herself in trouble as the stranger turns out to be a psychopath.

programme.title: Hard Ball
programme.desc: Conor O'Neill strikes a bargain in order to get a loan to pay off his gambling debts. He must coach a Little League baseball team to keep his end of the bargain.

programme.title: Jesse Stone: Death In Paradise
programme.desc: In Paradise, Massachusetts, the gruesome death of a teenage girl sends Jesse Stone on an enigmatic probe. On the other hand, he battles with guilt and helps a victim of domestic abuse.

programme.title: Fly Away Home
programme.desc: Amy moves to Ontario to live with her father after the death of her mother. Her father, an aviation expert, helps Amy lead a flock of orphaned geese south for the winters.

programme.title: If Lucy Fell
programme.desc: Joe and Lucy are best friends and roommates. Surprising events follow their decision to jump off the Brooklyn Bridge if they both don't find true love by the time Lucy turns 30.

programme.title: Peggy Sue Got Married
programme.desc: A middle-aged divorcee attending her 25th high school reunion regrets all her life's decisions. After fainting at the event, she wakes up and finds herself in her past.

programme.title: The Grudge
programme.desc: Muldoon, a detective and single mother, investigates a murder in a suburban neighbourhood. Soon, she realises that the house in which the incident occurred is cursed by an evil force.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: Qin, an accountant living in the UK, is targeted by the leader of a terrorist organisation. His only hope for survival is Vanguard, an elite security company.

programme.title: Fight To the Finish
programme.desc: Sean, an amateur fighter, interferes in the personal life of a hardened criminal. When the criminal threatens his life, Sean decides to settle the matter in a fighting tournament.

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Dearly Depotted
programme.desc: Abby Knight, a flower shop owner, who happens to be an ex-attorney, investigates the murder of an unwanted wedding crasher.

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: A former soldier along with his teammates sets out on a mission to battle hordes of post-apocalyptic zombies in the Korean peninsula wastelands.

programme.title: Hotel Mumbai
programme.desc: A hotel staff risks everything to keep its patrons safe during a terror attack, especially a British heiress, her husband and her infant.

programme.title: St. Elmo's Fire
programme.desc: Seven close but self-centred friends in Georgetown struggle to deal with the transition from adolescence to adulthood and realise that life is not as easy as expected.

programme.title: La Bamba
programme.desc: Ritchie Valens, a teenage Mexican migrant, becomes an overnight rock 'n' roll star. As his star begins to ascend, he must deal with his brother's envy and the constant nightmares of a plane crash.

programme.title: Tootsie
programme.desc: Michael Dorsey, who is a brilliant but unemployed actor, disguises himself as a woman named Dorsey for a drama. His life reaches a hilarious climax when he falls in love with his co-star, Julie.

programme.title: Daddy Day Care
programme.desc: After getting fired, Charlie and Phil start a day-care facility to make ends meet. Once their business starts to pick up, the established day-care centre in town plans to bring them down.

programme.title: Jesse Stone: Night Passage
programme.desc: Jesse Stone, a former homicide detective from Los Angeles, becomes the police chief of a small New England town. Soon, he investigates a series of mysteries in this seemingly idyllic setting.

programme.title: The Caveman's Valentine
programme.desc: A homeless man is convinced that the death of a drug addict is more than what meets the eye. He also tries to mend his relationship with his estranged daughter, who is now a police officer.

programme.title: Miss Bala
programme.desc: Gloria gets abducted by a group of criminals when she visits Mexico to meet her friend Suzu. Later, she uses her wit to survive in the cruel world of crime.

programme.title: Hanna
programme.desc: Hanna, a 16-year-old who is raised by her father to be the perfect assassin, goes on a mission which takes her across Europe. However, she must avoid being captured by Marissa, a ruthless CIA agent.

programme.title: Conspiracy
programme.desc: A retired US Marine Sergeant decides to visit an old friend in the South West. However, when he arrives, he finds his friend missing and no one in town admits knowing him.

programme.title: Golmaal Returns
programme.desc: Gopal’s life hits choppy waters when he gets stuck on a yacht for a night upon rescuing an attractive young woman by fighting off some goons. Now, he has his wife suspecting him of having an affair and a police officer on his tail.

programme.title: Naya Din Nai Raat
programme.desc: Sushma runs away from home to escape an arranged marriage. During the course of her adventurous journey Sushma meets nine different men (all played by Sanjeev Kumar) corresponding to nine 'Rasa' each representing a distinct facet of human nature. Through these interesting encounters she is inspired to look at life with a renewed perspective.

programme.title: Hum Hain Lajawaab
programme.desc: A rich and rigid city man Pawan must fetch the young son of his deceased brother. As he travels, he meets a host of less blessed people and starts questioning his own ideologies.

programme.title: Golmaal Returns
programme.desc: Gopal’s life hits choppy waters when he gets stuck on a yacht for a night upon rescuing an attractive young woman by fighting off some goons. Now, he has his wife suspecting him of having an affair and a police officer on his tail.

programme.title: Dark Night
programme.desc: Seth Dhanraj gets mysteriously killed one night and his wife Alka suspects Kishan Shah of doing it. But is he really the murderer?

programme.title: Maassab
programme.desc: Ashish Kumar, a Dalit IAS officer with a social mission, faces a host of problems in his pursuit of making education accessible to deprived rural kids of India.

programme.title: Suhaag
programme.desc: Durga's twins are separated at birth. The one who stays with Durga becomes a police officer while the other is raised to become a petty gangster. They reunite when one is assigned to kill the other.

programme.title: Marudhar Express
programme.desc: Marudhar's marriage is arranged with an outspoken woman on the condition that they produce a child within a year of wedlock. With no experience in dealing with women, timid Marudhar embarks on an emotional journey as he tries to adjust to a new life.

programme.title: Xcuse Me
programme.desc: Chantu and Bantu are two meddling friends who join a hotel management program in Goa by deceit. During their training, they expose the illicit activities of many hotel personnel and guests.

programme.title: Shakalaka Boom Boom
programme.desc: A tale of two different musicians dramatically different but united by their passion for music set against the backdrop of the international music industry.

programme.title: Miss India
programme.desc: It is a story of young girls participating for a beauty contest. They share a love hate relationship as they are contenders. One day one of the top contenders is mysteriously murdered. The police steps in to investigate the case.

programme.title: Xcuse Me
programme.desc: Chantu and Bantu are two meddling friends who join a hotel management program in Goa by deceit. During their training, they expose the illicit activities of many hotel personnel and guests.

programme.title: Miss Teacher
programme.desc: Rose Dey is a newly appointed teacher at a college is considered to be extremely attractive. She is a nymphomaniac by nature. She meets Tanvesh at the college and starts having an affair with him.

programme.title: 30 Minutes
programme.desc: A crazy father uses torture to enforce punctuality on his child, who then develops psychological issues upon growing up. To get rid of his nightmares, he plans a life-and-death game called 30 Minutes for everyone who has ever dared to be late.

programme.title: Jeans
programme.desc: Madhumitha loves Vishu, who happens to have a twin brother. When Vishu's father insists that his sons will only marry twin sisters, Madhumitha pretends to be her own twin.

programme.desc: Three men decide to dive underwater to find treasure in a sunken ship, but one of them has a hidden agenda of his own.

programme.title: Official Bhootiyagiri Season 3 Episode 1
programme.desc: Once a CEO always a CEO. Dilawar gets a startup up and running even as he spends jail time. Just when his papad business in jail takes off, Dilawar is bailed and set free. He comes home to know that he has to take upon a challenge to change an ancient hotel profitable. However, the twist in the tale happens when he gets to know that the hotel is unsuccessful because it is haunted. Is the mansion really haunted? Will Dilawar be able to put his past behind and take on the challenge?

programme.title: Official Bhootiyagiri Season 3 Episode 5
programme.desc: Realising that the hotel is much more than just a piece of land to him, Dilawar plans to keep the mansion from getting auctioned. To do this he has to come up with a plan that has full shots of working. Dilwar, Kash, Malika and Prem decide to create the ultimate haunting in the hotel. However, in the end, the truth reveals itself and changes everything for Dilawar. He will never be the same person again

programme.title: Official Bhootiyagiri Season 3 Episode 4
programme.desc: The mansion’s past and his childhood memories haunt Dilawar more than the apparent demons outside. Tired of the constant struggle and the inability to face the place that started his anxiety disorder, Dilawar decides to sell the mansion and shut down the hotel. However, a heartfelt conversation with his father leads to a change in his heart. Will this reunion turn into something fruitful? Will this save the family property from getting sold?

programme.desc: India’s first-ever reality show based on a social experiment that explores the relationship between the sexes.

programme.title: Episode 8 | Joey’s Bartending Task
programme.desc: Joey, as the re-gendered Juhi visits a night club and has to complete a bartending task.

programme.title: Episode 5 | The First Mission
programme.desc: The participants finally step out for their very first mission.

programme.title: A.I.SHA | Episode 4
programme.desc: Sam’s life is spinning out of control. Not only has Kriti developed feelings for Sid but Siddhu also threatens him about A.I.SHA. Will Sam be able to keep A.I.SHA safe?

programme.title: Episode 21 | Sabki Sattvik Aas
programme.desc: The boys express their concern about all the recent food bans in India and prepare for Caulipops, lollipops that look and taste like chicken lollipops, but are 100 per cent vegetarian, just in case someone somewhere calls for a ban on chicken.

programme.title: Episode 2 | Arré Grub | This Week In Food
programme.desc: Trumped Up HOT DOG

programme.title: Episode 25 | Maa Kaun hai?
programme.desc: This Week In Food, the boys take a backseat as their mums take over. They cook the Mother Of All Dals with dollops of TLC aka butter, ghee, and cream. Get a taste of Mamta Ki Mithaas, as they prepare the Franken-dessert thats part gulab jamun, part halwa, and all mamta.

programme.title: The Farm Life | Episode 3
programme.desc: Chef Shagun travels to Nagpur to rustle up tasty treats using the juiciest oranges

programme.title: The Farm Life | Fresh Fruit Chaat
programme.desc: The Farm Life has a mixed bag of oranges and lemons for you

programme.title: Episode 2 | Steven Spielberg Versus Indie Cameraman
programme.desc: The KJo vs Tarantino squabble continues, struggle to make the worlds most viral video. An indie filmmaker makes a special appearance.

programme.title: Episode 1 | Kabhi Kill Kabhi Bill
programme.desc: Two film students Abbaas and Mastan have been hired to make the world’s most viral video.

programme.title: The Farm Life | Episode 2
programme.desc: Youve heard of going bananas but this time Shaguns going guavas in search of this fruit. Join her as she visits yet another farm and whips up a tasty treat

programme.title: Episode 3 | Caliphate to California
programme.desc: A major twist ensues, as the American cameraman discovers that Abbaas and Mastan are not actually terrorists! Will the duo ditch the caliphate and move to California?

programme.title: Episode 1 | Spandan Chukya’s First Day at the Office
programme.desc: Things dont always go according to plan, especially when youre an intern. But for Spandan Chukya, when nothing goes right, you take a left.

programme.title: Official Bhootiyagiri Season 3 Episode 3
programme.desc: Once the hotel gets rebranded, it starts attracting tourists and youngsters who love spooky and eerie places. Dilawar along with his team make up stories and fake ghosts to scare the guests and give them the thriller. All goes well until something unplanned starts happening. People start seeing things that Dilawar did not stage, and this sets him out to find the real culprit behind this. However, as he tries to unravel the truth, some other ugly truths unveil and come staring at him at his face. Now Dilawar knows who sent him to jail. What will he do next? Will Dilawar confront the culprit?

programme.title: Official CEOgiri Episode 2
programme.desc: Rati has cheated Dilawar, she has stolen all his clients. Desperate, he turns to Mallika for help. Magar kaun hai yeh Mallika?

programme.title: Episode 5 | Season Finale
programme.desc: Season Finale

programme.title: Krodhi
programme.desc: Vikramjeet 'Vicky' Singh becomes a gangster after an unfortunate incident. Years later, Neera, a CBI officer's wife who once worked for Vicky, meets a god-man, who is the gangster's lookalike.

programme.title: Mahaan
programme.desc: Vikram (Amjad Khan) is arrested for possession of drugs, but claims that he was framed by Rajan (Sujit Kumar), his associate, but no one believes him. Desperately he turns to his lawyer friend, Vikram, but get arested.

programme.title: Aap Beati
programme.desc: Geeta and her father undergo several hardships to ensure that Prakash gets an education abroad. However, things take a turn when, upon his return, he marries a rich girl.

programme.title: Abhimaan
programme.desc: Subir, a popular singer, encourages his wife Uma to take up a career in singing too. However, their marital bliss shatters when Uma's popularity surpasses his own. Cast: Amitabh Bachchan, Jaya Bhaduri, Director: Hrishikesh Mukherjee 1973

programme.title: Dulhe Raja
programme.desc: K. K. Singhania is shocked to find out that Raja, his enemy, has started a dhaba in the vicinity of his luxurious hotel. He is annoyed when his daughter Kiran decides to get married to Raja.

programme.title: Masti
programme.desc: Three friends meet after their marriages who are all disturbed by their wifes decided to take a break and look for the other girl but they put themselves in trouble and accused for the murder of a girl.

programme.title: Dil
programme.desc: Raja lives a poor life. He attends college where he has several run-ins with wealthy fellow-collegian, Madhu Mehra. When his dad comes to visit, he decides to approaches Mr. Mehra, and arranges for their children to get married.

programme.title: Amar Akbar Anthony
programme.desc: Three brothers are separated and united after many years - one is brought up a Hindu, another a Muslim and the last (and most memorable) a Christian. Hilarity and adventure ensues

programme.title: Mann
programme.desc: Priya wins a cruise abroad a luxury liner en-route from Singapore to India. Shortly after boarding, she meets with artistic playboy, Dev, and both fall in love with each other.

programme.title: Namak Halal
programme.desc: Young Arjun (Amitabh Bachchan) is brought up by his grandfather (Om Prakash). he finds a job as a servant in a 5-star hotel owned by Raja (Shashi Kapoor). and there he meets Poonam (Smita Patil) and falls in love with her.

programme.title: Aatish 1979
programme.desc: A wealthy man, Rai, has a no-good son and is glad to have found trustworthy Anand to help him with his business. But Anand is actually part of a conspiracy against Rai.
